name: runner
description: Local testing and cleanup scripts for SoundCloud downloader

scripts.test: cd .. && bash setup-act/setup-act.sh && mkdir -p /tmp/soundcloud-act-cache/apt-cache /tmp/soundcloud-act-cache/apt-lists && act workflow_dispatch --bind --container-architecture linux/amd64 --container-options '-v /tmp/soundcloud-act-cache/apt-cache:/var/cache/apt/archives -v /tmp/soundcloud-act-cache/apt-lists:/var/lib/apt/lists'
scripts.test:local:
npm run cleanup && cd ../soundcloud-token-getter && npm install && node index.js && cd ../soundcloud-downloader && npm install && node download.js euphonicsessions && cd .. && mkdir -p artifact-preview/soundcloud-json && cp -r soundcloud-downloader/tracks/* artifact-preview/soundcloud-json/ && echo '
Files created in artifact-preview/soundcloud-json:' && ls -lah artifact-preview/soundcloud-json/ | head -20
scripts.zip:
cd ../artifact-preview/out-playlists && zip -r ../playlists.zip . && echo '
Zip created: artifact-preview/playlists.zip'
